law.text: There is hereby created within the general fund a special buildings account from which expenditures may be made in carrying out the provisions of KRS 56.440 to 56.580. Unexpended balances in the buildings account shall carry forward from year to year without lapse.
law.history: Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. XVI, sec. 15, effective July 1, 1956.
